description: This easy banana bread recipe is packed full of oats and creamy banana. Make ahead for a tasty and nutritionally approved treat.
keywords: Banana bread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Baking,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Oat & Cinnamon Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Macro Organic rice malt syrup
3 large Macro Organic bananas, mashed (overripe, plus extra sliced to serve)
0.75 cup Macro Organic vanilla bean yoghurt
1 cup Macro Organic rolled oats (plus 2 tbs extra)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210°C/190°C fan-forced. Lightly grease a 24 x 13cm (6.5cm deep) loaf pan with baking paper.
Whisk eggs and syrup in a large bowl until combined. Add banana and yoghurt, then stir to combine. Add oats, flour and cinnamon, then stir until combined (do not overmix).

Pour mixture into pan and sprinkle with extra oats. Bake for 45 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centre comes out clean. Cool in pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Slice and serve with blueberries and extra banana.
